translation.description: Method to translate the specified type

translateDefault.description: Whether or not to translate the default value

combinator.description: Method to combine the specified type with other values

defaultMapping.description: default value found from the mapping of another node

fromOtherField.description: default value found from another field
fromOtherField.$comment: in the config json, the order of dataSource is important as this field refers to previous dataSource objects.
